author: jvanzyl
msg: o the invoker plugin is now working with the generated IT setup

author: hindessm
msg: Generating the test report takes ten minutes on my thinkpad so I've added
a short report mode that only reports on tests that have either errors or
failures.  It takes only a few seconds assuming most tests are passing.
Activate it with command line argument -Dshort.report=true.

author: mturyn
msg: Added a status line and method printing to it---opening an "alert" box would take focus from the textfield, triggering an "onEdit" event, whenever a key were pressed, making it hard to debug "onTextChange".

author: craigmcc
msg: Begin documenting the new Dialog Manager functionality.
